citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on
03MAR2022. The facility must ensure a responsible person is available during business hours for inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on 
03MAR2022.  The facility must ensure a responsible person is available during business hours for inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
